NEWATTRIBUTE_TEST.name: NEWATTRIBUTE_TEST
NEWATTRIBUTE_TEST.cause: Fill in the cause of the test fail.
NEWATTRIBUTE_TEST.treatment: Fill in the recommendation for fixing the fail.

DEPENDENCIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.name: DEPENDENCIES_COMPOSITION_TEST
DEPENDENCIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.cause: We detected an acceptable variation between inward vs outward dependencies count per microservice!
DEPENDENCIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.treatment: We recommend revising the use of Bounded Contexts in the design process.
DEPENDENCIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.details:
Service "Service A" has 2 outward dependencies.
Service "Service B" has 3 outward dependencies.
Service "Service C" has 3 outward dependencies.
Service "Service D" has 1 outward dependencies.

SCC_TEST.name: SCC_TEST
SCC_TEST.cause: We identified no strongly connected components between the microservices.
SCC_TEST.details: Services "[Service C, Service B]" has  to be grouped into one microservice.

NANOENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.name: NANOENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST
NANOENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.cause: We detected high variation between microservice's sizes.
NANOENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.treatment: We recommend reconsidering the sizes of the microservices.
NANOENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.details:
Service "Service A" has 10 nanoentities.
Service "Service B" has 14 nanoentities.
Service "Service C" has 40 nanoentities.
Service "Service D" has 18 nanoentities.

ENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.name: ENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST
ENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.cause: We detected an abnormally high variation between entities counts per microservice.
ENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.treatment: We recommend reconsidering the sizes of the microservices.
ENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.details:
Service "Service A" has 2 entities.
Service "Service B" has 4 entities.
Service "Service C" has 6 entities.
Service "Service D" has 1 entities.

RESPONSIBILITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.name: RESPONSIBILITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST
RESPONSIBILITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.cause: We detected an optimal variation between the use-cases counts per microservice.
RESPONSIBILITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.details:
Service "Service D" has 4 use cases.
Service "Service C" has 3 use cases.
Service "Service B" has 5 use cases.
Service "Service A" has 4 use cases.

RELATIONS_COMPOSITION_TEST.name: RELATIONS_COMPOSITION_TEST
RELATIONS_COMPOSITION_TEST.cause: We detected an abundance of duplicates among the entities of different relations.
RELATIONS_COMPOSITION_TEST.treatment: We recommend revising the relations between the microservices.
RELATIONS_COMPOSITION_TEST.details:
Entity "Item" has 3 duplicates.
Entity "Product" has 2 duplicates.
